Pencil Sharpener with Built-in Pencil Case: Create a pencil sharpener that comes with a built-in pencil case. This way, users can store their sharpened pencils in a convenient and organized manner. The pencil case can be made of a durable material, such as plastic or metal, and can be designed to fit snugly around the pencil sharpener.

Smart Pencil Sharpener with Bluetooth Connectivity: Develop a pencil sharpener that can connect to a user's smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth. This smart pencil sharpener can track the user's pencil usage and provide real-time feedback on the sharpness of the pencil. It can also alert the user when the pencil needs to be sharpened, making it easier to maintain a sharp pencil.

Pencil Sharpener with Eraser Attachment: Create a pencil sharpener that comes with an eraser attachment. This way, users can quickly and easily erase any mistakes or unwanted marks made while writing or drawing. The eraser can be attached to the pencil sharpener via a small clip or magnet, making it easy to use and replace.

Portable Pencil Sharpener with Solar Power: Design a portable pencil sharpener that runs on solar power. This means that users can take their pencil sharpener with them on the go, without worrying about running out of power. The solar panel can be integrated into the design of the pencil sharpener, making it compact and lightweight.

Pencil Sharpener with Built-in Pencil Holder: Create a pencil sharpener that comes with a built-in pencil holder. This way, users can store their pencils in one place, making it easier to access them when they need to use them. The pencil holder can be designed to hold multiple pencils, making it ideal for use in a classroom or office setting.
